Question
========

One study examined the relationship between age and the ability to focus on something. Below is a scatterplot of the results, along with the corresponding regression line._______________________ For each 10-year increase in age, the ability to focus decreases by approximately:

![](uva-equation-1392-nl-graph01.png)

Answerlist
----------

* 0.4
* 1
* 2.5
* 4

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.4: Incorrect
* 1: Incorrect
* 2.5: Incorrect
* 4: Correct
